Reviews.Title: Pyle DC TV for my RV
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was excited to purchase this TV so we could watch DVD's while camping on 12V with it's built in DVD player.  It also has a tuner so it picked up a few over the air digital channels.  We installed it in our RV and went camping the same weekend we received it.  The first evening in the campground, we put a DVD in it and the DVD refused to play it.  We tried another DVD, same issue.  The player was defective.  We contacted the factory and they promptly issued an RGA, but it cost me $60 to ship it back to them.  I am currently waiting for my replacement.  I will give the next one another chance to perform.  Unfortunately, we did not even get to play a movie to rate it's screen.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Happy,
Reviews.Author: soll
Reviews.Content: I have numerous LCD TVs but they are all larger than this one. I wanted a 15.6'' inch for ease of portability and the ability to take it on trips and to be used in different rooms as needed. Without getting technical, this unit seems to have a very sharp picture, great contrast and brightness, and a easy to use remote. The DVD player is high quality and for a DVD model the price is on believable. and with Removable Base Stand you put it on the wall I'm sure you will be glad you chose this TV...it's a rarity.

Reviews.Title: great van tv
Reviews.Author: K. Price "K Price"
Reviews.Content: We put this TV in van as a replacement.  I didn't know how to hook it into speaker system, but it's loud enough for kids to hear.  Easy to use and we love it!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: TV and DVD all in one... one less package for me to send!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H
Reviews.Content: Grandson asked for a TV for Christmas, and being the good grandma I am of course I would send him one!  I didnt realize there were so many choices. Yikes! The DVD player is what sold me on this one for him.  It arrived on time and one piece.  Tommy said it workes great and he loves it. If he loves it so do I!

Reviews.Title: Works as expected, but the manual is awful
Reviews.Author: johaw "3sheets"
Reviews.Content: The TV and DVD both work with the included 110v and 12v power supplies.  Picture and sound are good for a 15'' TV.I'm giving this 4 out of 5 stars because the OEM (Pyle) packaging and manual are awful.  Also, I'm not sure if the OEM package includes the 12v (cigarette) power cable or if the seller included this (per the description on Amazon) because it is not listed on the OEM package.  Both the manual and OEM package indicate the DVD is on the right side; however, the DVD is on the left and you have to reverse the directions for inserting the DVD.  The manual also says to use the Input button to set the TV to DVD, but you need to use the Source button and down/up buttons to change the source to DVD before you can insert a DVD.Overall, this is what I expected, but it took an hour to figure out how to load/watch a DVD.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: ladyblue
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband who is a truck driver. He thinks it's the greatest thing since sliced bread! The color is great and it brings in the local channels perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Mcfarland "amazon ninja"
Reviews.Content: Replaced a larger unit (19") with this one in my van due to inoperable dvd player. This one works great, has a better viewing angle, and no buffering problems even on rough roads. Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: RV  TV
Reviews.Author: Noboyz4
Reviews.Content: Love the option with 12 Volt for RV camping. The LCD is crystal clear in cable or free off air reception in  1080i HD. No need to have a converter box since it is already incorporated with this unit. The TV can be Versa mounted and has HDMI, AV, VGA and YPbPr inputs,  a very  good option for your devices. Love this TV.

Reviews.Title: another unhappy customer - dvd does not work.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Just got this TV dvd combo yesterday from amazon.  It does not work. It will not except the Dvd. keeps kicking it back out. tried 5 new dvds.. all the same.  I was hoping to use it in my rv next week.  Very disapointed in this TV combo.

Reviews.Title: Great price, nice TV
Reviews.Author: Tim Swift
Reviews.Content: We just installed this television in our teardrop camper.  It was the only model that fit into our cabinets and had by far the best price.  We are delighted with this television after about a month of use.  With a small digital antenna, it picks up several great channels and plays DVD's very nicely.  The audio is just fine.  I recommend mounting it on an articulating arm, because the image is not good unless you are looking "straight at" the screen.

Reviews.Title: 12 volt tv
Reviews.Author: Allan Nevols
Reviews.Content: works great on disks with good picture quality and sound. You need a out door antanna for good results on normal transmission

Reviews.Title: Good tv bad manual
Reviews.Author: Douglas Laney "book user"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on or before date expected and was well packed and in good condition. Tested it and tv and DVD player worked. Only complaint is the owners manual. Bad spelling and grammar made it somewhat hard to read and understand. Recommend someone edit it.

Reviews.Title: 12 volt TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen F. Flynn
Reviews.Content: I use this TV on my boat and it works great. Very good pic and DVR built in is great.

Reviews.Title: Small TV
Reviews.Author: Texas "Grandma"
Reviews.Content: Seems good but have not figured out the set up -- too many options!  Setting up should not be that difficult!!  This TV did not come with an antenna coax.  SO I have not even been able to use this TV to see if it works.  Even tried a DVD and was not successful.  Too bad I do not have a five-year-old grandchild OR a computer expert to get me up and going.  Very disappointed about this.  I now have the coax but need a degree in electronics to be able to use this TV.  I am not technologically challenged . . . to be stumped by what should be a simple plug and play TV is not good for my ego!

Reviews.Title: 12 volt tv
Reviews.Author: James W. Haase
Reviews.Content: WAS SHIPPED FAST AND WELL PACKAGED TO AVOID DAMAGE. TV WAS EASY TO SET UP AND HAVING A BUILT IN DVD PLAYER WAS A PLUS.I WOULD LIKE TO SEE IT WITH A BUILT IN BATTERY AND AN INDOOR ANTENNA MOUNT.

ProductInfo.Features:
15.6'' LCD Screen - Built-In Progressive Scan DVD Player - Compatible Formats: DVD,VCD,MP3,CD,CD-RW
16:9 (Widescreen) Screen Aspect Ratio - Built-In Analog (NTSC)/Digital (HD/ATSC) Tuners - 262K Colors - 1366 x 768 High Resolution
HDTV Compatible: 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i - 400:1 Contrast Ratio - 220 Brightness cd/m2 - Progressive Scan CCD,
Built-In Speakers 2 x 3W - Removable Base Stand - VESA Wall Mount Compatible (Bracket not Included)
V-Chip - 90° Horizontal/ 45° Vertical Viewing Angle
ProductInfo.Name: Pyle - 12 Volt RV/Car/Truck/Boat Plug-in 15.6'' Hi-Definition LCD TV w/Built-in DVD Player
